subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The substitute Divock Origi scored in the 88th minute, a rare moment of excitement in the game, and Belgium secured a place in the Round of 16.
snippet: The substitute Divock Origi scored in the 88th minute, a rare moment of excitement in the game, and Belgium secured a place in the Round of 16.
